borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The applicant has failed to present plans which accurately portray the development present at the application site. Specifically the plans fail to demonstrate the existing pitched roof form of the porch and the rendered front elevation of the dwelling.&nbsp;<span style="text-align: justify;">The proposal could prejudice third parties who may otherwise have wished to comment on the application; the proposed development cannot be accurately assessed and it cannot be demonstrated that it would be supported by the Development Plan. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:&nbsp;</span></p><p style=""><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="">National Planning Policy Framework&nbsp;</span>National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal" style=""><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="line-height: 14.98px;">- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style=""><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="">- Policy CP3 of the&nbsp;</span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></p><p style=""><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="">- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the&nbsp;</span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal" style=""><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="line-height: 14.98px;">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style=""></p><p style=""><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="">- Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of&nbsp;</span>The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</p>

<div><span style="font-size:11pt">Notwithstanding reason for refusal 1, the proposed first floor side extension, by reason of its bulky scale, siting and resultant discordant, disjointed and incongruous roof forms, causes undue&nbsp;harm&nbsp;to the character and appearance of the property, terrace, and wider area, particularly given the location of the application site within the Becontree Estate. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</span><br></div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy D4 of the
London Plan (March 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies CP2 and CP3 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core
Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies BP2, BP8 and BP11 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF)
Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">









</p><p><b><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- </span></b><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of
Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version,
December 2021)<o:p></o:p></p></div>
description: Construction of a first floor side extension
